diamonds.title: Round Brilliant Diamond
diamonds.use: Ideal for engagement rings and high jewellery
diamonds.note: Round Brilliant diamonds are the most popular cut, engineered for maximum fire and brilliance with 57–58 precision facets. Highly liquid and preferred for investment-grade jewellery.

diamonds.title: Oval Cut Diamond
diamonds.note: Oval diamonds provide brilliant sparkle with elongated shape, offering larger visual size per carat and refined luxury appearance.

diamonds.title: Cushion Cut Diamond
diamonds.note: Cushion cut diamonds feature rounded corners and large facets producing soft brilliance with classic romantic appeal.

diamonds.title: Emerald Cut Diamond
diamonds.note: Emerald cuts highlight clarity and symmetry with elegant hall-of-mirrors effect preferred by collectors.

diamonds.title: Asscher Cut Diamond
diamonds.note: Asscher diamonds offer deep step facets and square symmetry producing bold geometric brilliance.

diamonds.title: Princess Cut Diamond
diamonds.note: Princess cut delivers sharp brilliance with modern square geometry and excellent fire.

diamonds.title: Pear Cut Diamond
diamonds.note: Pear shaped diamonds combine round brilliance with marquise elegance producing graceful tear-drop silhouette.

diamonds.title: Marquise Cut Diamond
diamonds.note: Marquise diamonds maximize surface area creating larger visual appearance and dramatic brilliance.

diamonds.title: Radiant Cut Diamond
diamonds.note: Radiant cut blends brilliant and step facets producing intense sparkle with rectangular form.

diamonds.title: Fancy Yellow Diamond
diamonds.note: Fancy yellow diamonds are valued for strong natural color saturation and luxury appeal.

diamonds.title: Champagne Diamond
diamonds.note: Champagne diamonds display warm brown tones popular in luxury contemporary designs.
